languages.text: {n}Однако идиллия длится недолго — на ваших глазах останки устройства заходятся лиловыми искрами, и из расплющенного динамика доносится знакомый голос Говорящего-с-Богами — хриплый и беспомощный.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Однако идилия длится недолго — на ваших глазах останки устройства заходятся лиловыми искрами, и из расплющенного динамика доносится знакомый голос Говорящего-с-Богами — хриплый и беспомощный.{/n}

languages.text: {n}But the calm does not persist for long — right before your eyes, the device's remains burst into purple sparks, and the squashed speaker emits the familiar voice of Speaks-With-Gods, hoarse and feeble.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Однако идиллия длится недолго — на ваших глазах останки устройства заходятся лиловыми искрами, и из расплющенного динамика доносится знакомый голос Говорящего-с-Богами — хриплый и беспомощный.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}But the calm does not persist for long — right before your eyes, the device's remains burst into purple sparks and the squashed speaker emits the familiar voice of Speaks-With-Gods, hoarse and powerless.{/n}

{n}But the calm does not persist for long — right before your eyes, the device's remains burst into purple sparks and the squashed speaker emits the familiar voice of Speaks-With-Gods, hoarse and powerless.{/n}

{n}But the calm does not persist for long — right before your eyes, the device's remains burst into purple sparks and the squashed speaker emits the familiar voice of Speaks-With-Gods, hoarse and powerless.{/n}

{n}But the calm does not persist for long — right before your eyes, the device's remains burst into purple sparks, and the squashed speaker emits the familiar voice of Speaks-With-Gods, hoarse and feeble.{/n}

{n}But the calm does not persist for long — right before your eyes, the device's remains burst into purple sparks, and the squashed speaker emits the familiar voice of Speaks-With-Gods, hoarse and feeble.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pero la calma no dura mucho: justo ante tus ojos, los restos del dispositivo estallan con una lluvia de chispas moradas y el amplificador destrozado emite la voz familiar de Habla-con-Dioses, ronca y débil.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But the calm does not persist for long — right before your eyes, the device's remains burst into purple sparks, and the squashed speaker emits the familiar voice of Speaks-With-Gods, hoarse and feeble.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pero la calma no dura mucho; justo ante tus ojos, los restos del dispositivo estallan con una lluvia de chispas moradas y el amplificador destrozado emite la voz familiar de Habla-con-Dioses, ronca e impotente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}但这样的安静并没有持续多久。装置的残骸在你眼前迸发出紫色的火花，已经被砸扁的通讯器发出了“神谕”那熟悉却又沙哑、虚弱的声音。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But the calm does not persist for long — right before your eyes, the device's remains burst into purple sparks, and the squashed speaker emits the familiar voice of Speaks-With-Gods, hoarse and feeble.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}但这样的安静并没有持续多久。装置的残骸在你眼前迸发出紫色的火花，已经被砸扁的通讯器发出了“神谕”那熟悉却又沙哑无力的声音。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Toutefois, le calme est de courte durée : sous vos yeux, des étincelles violettes jaillissent de l'appareil et la voix familière de Parle-aux-Dieux, rauque et faible, sort de l'émetteur détruit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But the calm does not persist for long — right before your eyes, the device's remains burst into purple sparks, and the squashed speaker emits the familiar voice of Speaks-With-Gods, hoarse and feeble.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Toutefois, le calme est de courte durée : sous vos yeux, des étincelles violettes jaillissent de l'appareil et la voix familière de Parle-aux-Dieux, rauque et faible, sort du haut-parleur détruit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}しかし、平穏な時間は長くは続かなかった。あなたの眼前でデバイスの残骸が紫色の火花を散らし、潰れたスピーカーが、しわがれた声で、弱々しく、おなじみの『神々との語り部』を発する。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But the calm does not persist for long — right before your eyes, the device's remains burst into purple sparks, and the squashed speaker emits the familiar voice of Speaks-With-Gods, hoarse and feeble.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}しかし、平穏な時間は長くは続かなかった。あなたの眼前でデバイスの残骸が紫色の火花を散らし、潰れたスピーカーが、しわがれた声で、弱々しく、おなじみの『神々との語り部』を発する。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Doch die Ruhe hält nicht lange an. Direkt vor deinen Augen schießt ein violetter Funkenschauer aus den Überresten des Geräts und der zertrümmerte Lautsprecher stößt die vertraute Stimme von Spricht-mit-den-Göttern aus, heiser und kraftlos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But the calm does not persist for long — right before your eyes, the device's remains burst into purple sparks, and the squashed speaker emits the familiar voice of Speaks-With-Gods, hoarse and feeble.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Doch die Ruhe hält nicht lange an. Direkt vor deinen Augen schießt ein violetter Funkenschauer aus den Überresten des Geräts und der zertrümmerte Lautsprecher stößt die vertraute Stimme von Spricht-mit-den-Göttern aus, heiser und kraftlos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ancak huzur hissi uzun sürmüyor. Cihaz, gözlerinin önünde mor kıvılcımlarla patlıyor ve ezilen hoparlör, boğuk ve zayıf olsa da aşina olduğun Tanrıların Dili'nin sesini yayıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But the calm does not persist for long — right before your eyes, the device's remains burst into purple sparks, and the squashed speaker emits the familiar voice of Speaks-With-Gods, hoarse and feeble.{/n}
